ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | srapart.a | |- ( ph -> A = ( ( subringAlg ` W ) ` S ) ) |
| 2 |  | srapart.s | |- ( ph -> S C_ ( Base ` W ) ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_srabase | |- ( ph -> ( Base ` W ) = ( Base ` A ) ) |
| 4 | 1, 2 | #P_sratset | |- ( ph -> ( TopSet ` W ) = ( TopSet ` A ) ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_topnpropd | |- ( ph -> ( TopOpen ` W ) = ( TopOpen ` A ) ) |
